metadata.name: THE GOAT CR
metadata.description: This year would be the last year for one of the greatest football players to have existed, A player who has played in 5 World Cups, and scored in all 5 World Cups, also a player who has won the Ballon d'Or more than 3 times. I created this piece as a tribute to one of the greatest football players, it resembles him as half man half cyborg. As he works like a machine I decided to show it off in a way that we believe that he could be a cyborg from the style of his game. This media was done purely in Adobe Photoshop, drawn and painted in Photoshop.
